H0.text: Osmic relates to which of the senses. Taste

H1.text: Osmic relates to which of the senses. Hearing

H2.text: Osmic relates to which of the senses. Touch

H3.text: Osmic relates to which of the senses. Smell

A4.text: The sense of smell, or olfaction, is the special sense through which smells (or odors) are perceived.

A5.text: The sense of smell has many functions, including detecting desirable foods, hazards, and pheromones, and plays a role in taste.
